message.text: Welcome to #name. You are playing the Zelador_v0.5.314 Map
Join our community discord at https://discord.gg/DWXTaEXyUe to report in-game discoveries.
We highly recommend that you also read our `Tourist Handbook` channel in our dev discord.
Enjoying the map? Please consider contributing to development in some way, it's a massive project.
IMPORTANT: SOME BUNKERS can become TRAPS join our dev discord and read the tourist booth. Invite: gg.DWXTaEXyUe
Please be sure you are in the correct discord for the server owner. Do so before you file tickets re: players or rule breakers.
We welcome any feedback, please use discord tickets! https://discord.gg/DWXTaEXyUe
If you are hosting this version of our map, please change messages to suit your community & server information / rules.
Accepting applications for discord growth team, and dev team roles. Please visit CMOGAMING.COM for more information.
Please do your part to help the server fun, healthy, happy, and free from toxic interactions.
This map is a WORK IN PROGRESS (WIP) report discoveries at gg.DWXTaEXyUe NOTE: we do not process complaints.
Be your most entertaining and apocalyptic self, but do not be toxic!
Heading into the NB Series BUNKERS? You probably need a team - ENTER BUNKERS SOLO AT YOUR OWN RISK!
Thank you for helping improve our map! We do Hope you are enjoying your time on Zelador v0.5.314
You may be playing on a publicly hosted community server one that is not operated by the Map Developer.
You are playin on a test-release of a portion of the Zelador map! ~ Created by: DeGrinchy
Not sure what to do? Join our dev Discord: https://discord.gg/DWXTaEXyUe read the Touris Booth!
Did you know you can quickly and easily repair & update your mods. DayZ launcher > mods > right-click modname > repair
Zelador Developer Discord: https://discord.gg/DWXTaEXyUe
BUNKER may require a team. Enter at your own risk! Read Discord Tourist Booth or ask for information in discord.
Zelador is a WIP. Support developments by submitting discoveries, or donate to server costs if you can. discord invite: DWXTaEXyUe
Using ZELADOR in your VOD title will help me a lot and assit in improving map developments, thank you! ~ DeGrinchy
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/DWXTaEXyUe
Interested in a Test Player Role? Visit cmogaming.com community discord, invite code: DWXTaEXyUe
NOTICE: #name restarting in #tmin minutes or less.
